# oldScaleFactorUserInfoKey

**Type Property**

An NSNumber containing the old scale factor.

## Declaration

```swift
class let oldScaleFactorUserInfoKey: String
```

## Constants

- **oldColorSpaceUserInfoKey**: An [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorSpace] instance containing the old colorspace.
